5. Yukiyama yori SOS (雪山より
SOS (SOS from the Snowy Mountains)) [Uncensored]
A mountain climber is trapped in a blizzard and two ?rescue dogs? come to save him. Oddly enough, their body fluids are nutritious.

8. Akuma to, Yume no nai Otoko. (悪魔と、夢のない男。(The Demon and the Dreamless Guy.))
A dreamless guy accidentaly activates as magic circle when cleaning and summon a demon. The demon wants a price to be paid for the wish he was granted by activating the circle. Being dreamless he doesn't know what to wish for until the price is paid.

10. Komatta Toki no Nanto yara.
11. Mamma♥Mia!
